metadata.synopsis: Magic mouth spell communicating the warning of the Abbess to the passing monks. Due to the limitations of the spell this AD can't be longer than 25 words! It warns the passerby of the invasion, and alludes to the plan to destroy it as a last ditch effort.

0.speaker: Bust
0.text: Stand your ground! Keep them busy.

1.speaker: Bust
1.text: Lathander forgive me - we have to fire the Lance.
